thread.title: Two officers shot in Houston; suspect on the loose
thread.title_full: Two officers shot in Houston; suspect on the loose | Fox News

author: foxnews.com
title: Two officers shot in Houston; suspect on the loose
text:
Email Print DEVELOPING –   A shooting in Houston wounded two police officers Tuesday as investigators engaged in a frantic hunt for one suspect.
Map of Shelter-in-Place area as of 1:30pm https://t.co/OUfeQL0MKA #hounews 
— Houston OEM (@HoustonOEM) February 28, 2017 Officials urged people in the area, in the city's southwest, to shelter in place. Paramedics rushed one officer to Ben Taub Hospital and another to Memorial Hermann Hospital-Texas Medical Center,  Fox 26 reported .
Police killed a second suspect,  according to KTRK . They may have been responding to a burglary call, the  Houston Chronicle added .
One suspect is outstanding please shelter in place if you're residing in the area & avoid the area if you don't.
— Chief Art Acevedo (@ArtAcevedo) February 28, 2017 The officer at Ben Taub Hospital reportedly was in stable condition. The other officer was in serious condition but injuries were unclear, KTRK reported.
Click for more from Fox 26.
